channel.title: two-pointers on Headstone lamp - Always has been
channel.description: Recent content in two-pointers on Headstone lamp - Always has been

item.title: 11. Container With Most Water
item.description: # O(n) time || O(1) space def max_area(self, height: List[int]) -> int: area, low, high = 0, 0, len(height) - 1 while low < high: area = max(area, min(height[low], height[high]) * (high - low)) if height[low] <= height[high]: low += 1 else: high -= 1 return area
